short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Displays upcoming Nepali Festivals with the countdown in one click.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Nepali Festivals Tracker Chrome Extension is a simple yet powerful tool that helps you stay connected to your Nepali heritage, no matter where you are in the world. 
ğŸ‰ With just one click, you can access a list of the four upcoming major Nepali festivals, along with the number of days remaining until each one.

ğŸŒŸ Key Features of Nepali Festivals Tracker Chrome Extension:
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
1. Displays a list of the four upcoming major Nepali festivals
2. Shows the number of days remaining until each festival
3. Simple and easy to use
4. Lightweight and doesn't slow down your browsing
5. Regular updates to ensure accuracy

ğŸ† Benefits of Nepali Festivals Tracker Chrome Extension:
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
âœ… Helps you stay connected to your Nepali culture, even if you're living, studying, or working abroad
âœ… Useful for travelers (tourists) who want to experience Nepali festivals
âœ… Convenient for everyone who wants to know about upcoming Nepali festivals without having to open Nepali Calendar apps
âœ… Promotes cultural awareness and appreciation

ğŸ‘¨ğŸ»â€ğŸ’» How to Use:
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
1. Install the Nepali Festivals Chrome Extension from the Chrome Web Store (Pin to Toolbar for Quick Access).
2. Click on the extension icon in your browser's toolbar.
3. A popup window will appear, displaying a list of the four upcoming major Nepali festivals and the number of days remaining until each one (First upcoming festivals is shown in Big text and the rest of the 3 are shown in smaller texts).
